body:
some updates to blas/lapack usage inside packages to incorporate https://github.com/LLNL/spack/pull/1682 and also fix a few issues.

builds on `Ubuntu@16.04`+`gcc@5.4.0`:
- [x] `dealii@develop ^atlas`
- [x] `dealii@develop ^openblas`
- [x] `dealii@develop ^mkl`
- [x] `cantera ^openblas`
- [x] `ipopt ^openblas`
- [x] `Mfem+lapack ^openblas`
- [x] `SuperluMt ^openblas`
- [ ] `netliblapack+external-blas ^openblas`

p.s. i uninstall system's `blas`/`lapack` to make sure they are not picked up somewhere and lead to a false positive build.
title: some fixes to blas/lapack usage in packages
